description: Teaches you how to beckon your subdued Abyssal Seahorse.  Can only be summoned in aquatic environments.
name: Reins of Poseidus

spell.name: Subdued Seahorse
spell.description:
Summons and dismisses a rideable Subdued Seahorse. This mount is a zippy swimmer.



Due to his capricious nature, swim speed is not affected by effects that increase or decrease mount speed.

requiredAbility.name: Expert Riding
requiredAbility.description: You can now learn to ride flying mounts from your riding trainer.
